result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amos Montrell Ashford

defendant.name: Ashford, Amos Montrell

records.addlTxt: Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($500.00 signature bond) LW
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court orders bail/bond forfeited.

Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford not in court.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo in court for Amos Montrell Ashford.  Attorney Tyler Rubenzer in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Calendar Call.  
Defendant failing to appear, Court lifted the stay of the Bench Warrant.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court orders bail/bond forfeited.

Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford not in court.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in Court for Status of counsel. Defense counsel is on vacation, unable to appear.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Case remains calendared in Reserve Branch in Room 508CH.
Calendar call scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Calendar call on October 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Amos Montrell Ashford.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Attorney Wentz informs the Court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 13.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant to be LISR evaluated on 8/25/2022.   DPA Hearing scheduled in Reserve Branch 13.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford in court with attorney Michael Fuentes for Haley E Wentz.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amos Montrell Ashford appeared by video means with Attorney.
Defense counsel informed the Court that this may be a DPA and the defendant is to get a TAD evaluation scheduled.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.
All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with REC
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford in court with attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Amos Montrell Ashford in custody at HOC. Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amos Montrell Ashford appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
